issue.title: [Developer][Integration] Add integration tests for extension types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8035](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8035). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will extend the test runners for each implementation: each must register an extension type (I arbitrarily nominate `uuid` from the C++ unit tests for extension types) which will be serialized to its storage type and the reserved metadata fields.
